name: Dicey Doubles
description:
In Dicey Doubles the player has been pulled from their world into the demon realm where they are the latest contestant in the demon realm's hottest gambling fad. The player must complete all of the puzzles that lay ahead in order to get out with their life.

Dicey Doubles is a puzzle game where the player controls an avatar that possesses a large die to match a number on the floor with the face up die number. Moving the die causes it to rotate on the appropriate axis. Each level will all have their own different tasks and trials that the player will have to overcome such as pitfalls, walls, jumps, multiple dice.

CREDITS:

James Boyer

Jesse Monroe

Cody Maye

Daniel Shappell

Caleb Massey
